verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: In April] , [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: enacted] [ARG1: a " zero tolerance " immigration policy that calls for the separation of parents and children who cross the border between the US and Mexico] . In Sunday 's episode of " Last Week Tonight , " John Oliver slammed the policy and disproved its religious justification .
